description: I. Dear Colleague letter dated 31/07/2008 from Christine Beasley, Chief Nursing Officer, regarding MRSA screening. 4 p. II. Saving Lives: reducing infection, delivering clean and safe care. Screening for meticillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) colonisation. A strategy for NHS trusts: a summary of best practice. 6 p.
